relationships.description: Tyrion killed his father Tywin with a crossbow.
relationships.evidence: Iâ€™ve killed my father... A bolt in the belly, my lord, and all for you.
I killed Shae too, he confessed to Varys.
Oberyn was dead, though, his head smashed to bloody ruin by the armored fist of Ser Gregor Clegane.
This is Pentos, yes? ... Just so. Where else?

relationships.description: Stannis is currently at the Wall.
relationships.evidence: Stannis is at the Wall? Tyrion rubbed at his nose.
My niece Myrcella is in Dorne, as it happens.

relationships.description: Illyrio is a magister of Pentos.
relationships.evidence: I have the honor to be a magister of this great city

schema_proposals.name: host_of
schema_proposals.description: Indicates that one entity is providing shelter or hospitality to another.

schema_proposals.name: ally_of
schema_proposals.description: Indicates a political or personal alliance between entities that does not fit strict hierarchy like sworn_to.
